entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 29 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:29 PM CST Friday 06 January 2023
